title: xubuntu-7.10-desktop-powerpc+ps3.iso
description:
This is the Xubuntu 7.10 version port for PS3 and PowerPC.

PlatForm: PS3 and PowerPc
Size: 546Mb
Language: Multilingual. (ability to choose wichever language you wish.)
Requirements: USB Keyboard/Mouse
Parts: 1
Other: 100% Legal to download, wherever you are. (and proud of it)

(Have i put all the necessary information? comments are welcome)

More info:
PS3 users, this is not a hack. It does not void your PlaystationÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 3 warranty either. It's what the "Other OS" option of your console is for. installing this OS on your PS3 is riskless and will enable you to use it as a standard computer (well almost). Xubuntu is a more casual version of Ubuntu, wich is based on linux and is totally free. Installation of this OS will not erase the original OS. you will be able to go back to it when you wish. To do so, at the boot screen type this line:

boot-game-os

then press enter

Or hold the power button for 10seconds when starting your PS3, after what you will hear a Double-Beep. (refer to your PS3 owner's manual for more details if you want.)

After this the Xmb will come back and your PS3 will function Normally.
